org.springframework.amqp.support.converter

Class WhiteListDeserializingMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.amqp.support.converter.AbstractMessageConverter
      • org.springframework.amqp.support.converter.WhiteListDeserializingMessageConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageConverter
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class WhiteListDeserializingMessageConverter
extends AbstractMessageConverter

    • Method Detail

      • setWhiteListPatterns

        public void setWhiteListPatterns(List<String> whiteListPatterns)
        Set simple patterns for allowable packages/classes for deserialization. The patterns will be applied in order until a match is found. A class can be fully qualified or a wildcard '*' is allowed at the beginning or end of the class name. Examples: com.foo.*, *.MyClass.
        Parameters:
        whiteListPatterns - the patterns.

      • addWhiteListPatterns

        public void addWhiteListPatterns(String... patterns)
        Add package/class patterns to the white list.
        Parameters:
        patterns - the patterns to add.
        Since:
        1.5.7
        See Also:
        setWhiteListPatterns(List)

      • checkWhiteList

                       throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException
